---===*** Instructions ***===---

1. Run the setup from downloaded file.
2. Wait for installation to finish (5 min approx).
3. Play from desktop or midtown.exe

If you have any problem with setup give as much details as you can about the problem in comments

---===*** Possible Problems you may Encounter ***===---
1.   No Sound in Game
Sol: Run the game then click on Options => Audio Options, now click on Device and select
     Primary Sound Driver then click on Done.
    <a href=" http://bayimg.com/aaeceaagP" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://bayimg.com/aaeceaagP</a>
     If you still can't hear the sound then try other Device in the Device option.

2.   Game Lags / Slow gameplay
sol: Run the game then click on Options => Graphis Options, now click on Renderer and select
     any renderer other than Software Renderer.
     Just dont select Software Renderer.
    <a href=" http://bayimg.com/aAEcGAaGp" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://bayimg.com/aAEcGAaGp</a>

please seed and leave feedback after downloading
